title: Looking for Jungle and ADC roles for team
body:
Just have a couple of friends looking to get out of normals and into somthing a bit more serious but we need more members. Attmosphere will be serious enough and critisism is always accepted but also a rather chillded and fun time since its only a game after all.

Must be 18+
And have curse ( or skype at the minimum )
Roles looking for are: Jungle and ADC main

We each play differant roles so we can swap out people every so often

IGN: nightlord99
Add me or reply for more info or for an invite
